TopicTitle: BUG Cant switch camera focus. How has this not been fixed yet?

Articles.Content:
I've been playing the game for long over a year and this still happens on a regular basis. I'm in map overview trying to check my route or whatever, I pick a planet for focus, and then i can't get it back to the spacecraft. I can switch to some other planet if i want (sometimes) but i basicly have to go back to ground and fix it. This seem like an easy thing to fix or am i just stupid?

![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif) That backspace thing is so useful. I didn't realize it until about a year ago.
You can also tab and shift-tab between planets. Watch out, though, as "shift" has a kind of important use already. Go up to 5x time warp before shift-tabbing.
